Translations.Text: D wagi is Ipbeccio Oebbi imdanen iS, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ taqdiat, af waya, siwa lmaenana i llezm nnwen". Win ixedmen ise$, ad as Nernu degs lehhu. Oebbi, ih, Ipsemmie, Ippara tajmilt
Ne$ a d inin: "isnulfa d tikerkas af Oebbi". Ma ihwa yaS i Oebbi, ad Icemmaa ul ik. S wawal iS, ad Isqucc Oebbi tikerkas, ad Ieeqqeq tidep. Ih, Neppa Ieoa tababnit n idmaren
D Neppa i Iqeblen nndama n yimdanen iS. Ipsemmie tucmitin. Issen ayen txeddmem
Issemeas i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Ad asen Irnu si lfevl iS. I ijehliyen, aaaqeb uqsie
Ma Issuget Oebbi l$it i imdanen iS, ad be$wven di tmurt. Maca, Issrusu d, s lmizan, ayen i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa Ippuxebbeo $ef imdanen iS, Ipwali ten
D Neppa id Isse$layen ageffur mara aysen. Iweppaa aeunu S. Neppa d Bab, d Amaazuz
Seg issekniyen iS, lxelq n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan n leweuc, degsen. Izmer Neppa, ma ihwa yaS, a ten id Issemlil
Kra n tiyta ikwen iwwten, siwa ayen d bbwin ifassen nnwen. Aias i Ipsemmie
Ur tezmirem a ppesfunngem di tmurt. Ur awen illi, war Oebbi, bab ne$ asettao
